(NOTE!! Both forward and backward buttons are not recognized on Mac).     【USB Port Required】The memzuoix wireless mouse connects via a USB receiver and requires your computer to have a USB port.If your laptop doesn't have a usb port, you can use a hub to connect them.     【Widely Used】The wireless mouse is suitable for use in the office, home, school.Ergonomic wireless mouse is easy to carry, you can put it in the computer bag and take it to the coffee shop, library for office. It is also a good gift for family and friends on special days such as the school season and Christmas.

(PLEASE NOTE: The mouse is better suited for SMALL to MEDIUM-sized hands. However, if you have larger hands yet enjoy a smaller mouse, you might also like this one.)     Rechargeable Mouse: Say goodbye to constantly changing batteries. Our bluetooth mouse for laptop is rechargeable, taking only 1.5 to 2 hours to fully charge. Once fully charged, it provides around 3 months of usage (based on 2 hours of daily use). It's the perfect solution for those looking for a rechargeable wireless mouse. (A charging cable is included.)     6 Adjustable Level: This computer mouse offers 6 adjustable DPI levels (4800/3200/2400/1600/1200/800), allowing you to easily customize DPI to suit your preferences. Whether you need precise control for detailed work or swift movement for browsing, this wireless mouse for laptop has you covered.     Silent Operation: Enjoy a noiseless experience with this silent mouse. The wireless bluetooth mouse is designed to provide quiet operation, making it suitable for environments where silence is appreciated, such as libraries or offices.     Wide Compatibility: The wireless silent mouse is compatible with various systems including Windows/macOS/Chrome/Linux. It works seamlessly with laptop, computers and other devices, making it a versatile option for anyone in need of a wireless computer mouse. (Side buttons are not compatible with macOS)     36 MONTHS SUPPORT: If you encounter any problems in using the product, please feel free to contact our professional customer service team, enjoying TECKNET 36 Months Warranty (Registered Only)

No delays or dropouts, simply plug and play.     【VIBRANT RGB 7-COLOR BACKLIGHT】 The RGB gaming mouse features a flowing rainbow backlight that adds a visually stunning atmosphere to your workspace. Convenient switch to turn off the light when desired.     【3 DPI ADJUSTABLE & BATTERY RECHARGEABLE】 Adjust the mouse's DPI levels (1600-1200-800) for precise control. The built-in 600mAh lithium battery is rechargeable via USB-C cable, with a low battery indicator for timely charging.     【WIDE COMPATIBILITY】 Compatible with various devices such as PC, Mac Notebook, Laptop, Tablet, desktop, Computer, and more. Supports Windows 7/8/10/XP/VISTA/MAC OS, ensuring versatility.

details.detail_item: 【LIGHTWEIGHT HONEYCOMB SHELL DESIGN】 The gaming mouse is made of high-quality ABS material and designed with an ergonomic hollow perforated housing, reducing weight and providing a comfortable grip even during long gaming sessions.
